name: Dawn of War Map File
summary: Learn about .SGB files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: SGB files are one of several files that comprise a Dawn of War map. They can be found in the Data\​Scenarios\​MP folder within Dawn of War installations.

description: File used by Dawn of War, a real-time strategy game; contains a multi-player map with starting and resource locations, terrain, map size, and victory conditions; used to create modifications and new maps for original game content.
